arts.sum: Roma have officially announced the signing of Victor Nelsson from Galatasaray, bolstering their defensive options for the remainder of the 2024-2025 season. The 26-year-old Danish centre-back joins the Giallorossi on a loan deal with an option to buy, marking an exciting addition to Claudio Ranieri's squad. The post OFFICIAL: Roma Sign Victor Nelsson appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Official | Eintracht Frankfurt sign Galatasaray striker Michy Batshuayi
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt were able to conclude a blockbuster deal just before the close of the transfer window on Monday.
The forward arrives with immediate effect from Galatasaray SK after penning a deal valid until 30 June 2027.

arts.ttl: Wolves transfer news: Mario Lemina on brink of exit for €2.5m fee?
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers reportedly agree to sell Mario Lemina for a fee in the region of €2.5m (£2.08m) on deadline day.

Fiorentina have officially announced the acquisition of Nicolò Zaniolo from Galatasaray on a temporary basis with an option to make the transfer permanent. This move marks a return to familiar territory for Zaniolo, who began his youth career in Fiorentina's academy. The post OFFICIAL: Nicolo Zaniolo Joins Fiorentina appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray to sign Wolves’ Mario Lemina on loan
arts.sum: Wolves midfielder Mario Lemina (31) will be allowed to secure a deadline day loan move to Galatasaray once Wolverhampton sign Marshall Munetsi (28) from Ligue 1 outfit Reims, according to…

arts.ttl: Official: Zaniolo joins Fiorentina from Galatasaray
arts.sum: Nicolò Zaniolo has officially terminated his loan with Atalanta, as Galatasaray confirm the switch to...

arts.ttl: Frankfurt in talks with Galatasaray over Michy Batshuayi loan move
arts.sum: According to a report from L’Équipe, Bundesliga side Frankfurt are in deadline day discussions with Galatasaray over the potential loan of striker Michy Batshuayi (31). Despite signing Olympique de Marseille forward Elye…
Opaleak has just shared the official image of the Galatasaray AŞ's new 2024-2025 fourth strip, which features a quite unique design.

arts.ttl: Alvaro Morata makes surprise move to Galatasaray just six months since joining AC Milan... only days after announcing he is back together with his wife following five-month split
arts.sum: Alvaro Morata has completed his suprise loan move to Turkish side Galatasaray for £5million after just six dissapointing months at AC Milan, where he scored six goals
